name: Endless Addons – WordPress Plugin For Elementor Website Builder
author: EnvyTheme

sections.description:
Endless Addons WordPress plugin can help you create more addons for your website. The plugin offers extra-ordinary features, including easy-to-use options for creating and customizing addons for ultimate needs. It is compatible with Elementor Website Builder, WooCommerce, Contact Form 7, WP Forms, Ninja Forms, Mailchimp & GTranslate plugins.

Check the Demos

30+ Ready Blocks and Templates through Endless Addons

Use pre-made templates and sections which comes with Endless Addons and design your website to stand out from the crowd.

Completely Customizable

Each element comes with bunch of options to control every possible things. You can achieve nearly any design with your imagination.

Light Weight & Instant Loading

No extra resources or messy codes to slow down your website. Optimized for super fast loading and instant Live editing.

Elements Control option

Enable and disable individual elements to make your page loading faster and smoother. You can deactivate unnecessary widgets to keep the site lite.

Expert Support

We have extra-ordinary support team ready to help you. Ask your questions in the support forum, or contact us directly through live chat and contact form.

Elementor website builder is required for this plugin.

30+ FREE WIDGETS WITH MULTIPLE STYLES

We have designed 30 of the most useful widgets with multiple styles to enhance your Elementor Page Building experience and allow you to climb the top of your design capabilities.

  1. Banner – Showcase banner features with 7 unique styles

  2. Card – Create card features with 7 unique styles and also it is compatible with woocommerce

  3. Flipbox – Create flipbox features with 7 unique styles and also it is compatible with woocommerce

  4. Infobox – Create infobox features with 8 unique styles and show all information with specific columns.

  5. Pricing – Create multiple pricing tables with 8 unique styles and show all table with multiple features.

  6. Team Member – Create multiple team member with 7 unique styles and show all memebers title, position, social etc.

  7. Testimonial – Create multiple testimonial features with 7 unique styles and show all memebers title, position, comments etc.

  8. Timeline – Create multiple timeline reminder with 7 unique styles and showcase date, time, icon etc.

  9. Accordion – Create multiple accordion with 7 unique styles and showcase question and answer separately.

  10. Button – Create various types of button with 9 unique styles. Single and multiple buttons are available there.

  11. Contact Form 7 – 7 unique styles including contact details phone, email, address and also google map.

  12. Logo Carousel – 10 unique styles with incredible color and background combination.

  13. Newsletter – 7 unique styles with showcase social media, featured image, background image and shape image.

  14. Progress Bar – 6 unique styles and showcase progress bar percentage with animation.

  15. Video – Create multiple video section with 7 unique styles and showcase video with background image.

  16. Fun Factor – Create multiple fun factor section with 9 unique styles and showcase fun factor with icon, image and data.

  17. Iconbox – Create multiple iconbox with 8 unique styles and showcase icon with image.

  18. Imagebox – Create 8 types of imagebox with data title and description.

  19. Image Gallery – Create 8 types of image gallery with multiple columns.

  20. Social Media – Create multiple social media section with 9 unique styles and showcase social media with icon, link, color etc.

  21. Menu Bar – Create 8 types of menu bar styles and showcase menu bar with phone, signin, cart icon, language translator, search, social media etc.

  22. Business Hours – Create multiple business hours section with 6 unique styles and showcase business hours with shape image, background image, featured image etc.

  23. Roadmap Addons – 6 unique styles and showcase roadmap addons with shape image, background image, featured image, title, description etc.

  24. WP Forms – 4 unique styles and showcase wp forms with featured image and contact details.

  25. Ninja Forms – There are multiple types of form as like contact form, inquiry form, feedback form and registration form.

  26. Event Calendar – Advanced event management system with date and time picker.

  27. Reviews – 6 unique styles and showcase reviews with excellent owl carousel process.

  28. Blog Posts – 6 unique styles with blog title, blog description, featured image, shape image etc.

  29. Tabs – There are 7 types of tabs styles with featured image, shape image and multiple color combination.

  30. Footer Addons – There are 7 types of footer styles with about widget, contact widget, menu widget, instagram images, blog post, social media etc.

More features and improvements are coming on regular updates.

Documentation and Support

  • For documentation and tutorials go to our Documentation
  • If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum
  • For more information about features, FAQs and documentation, check out our website at Endless Addons for Elementor.

Endless Addons Management

  • Card

sections.installation:
Note : This plugin works with Elementor. Make sure you have Elementor plugin installed.

From the dashboard:

  1. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section
  2. Search For “Endless Addons”
  3. Install, then Activate it

From the control panel:

  1. Unzip (if it is zipped) and Upload endless-addons folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without Elementor Page Builder?

No. You cannot use without Elementor since it’s an addon for Elementor.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! It will work with any theme where Elementor works.
